articles.title: Last reactor shut down at Ukraine's largest nuclear plant as fighting, flooding continues - CBS News
articles.description: Ukraine's nuclear energy agency says it has put the last operating reactor at Europe's largest nuclear power plant into a "cold shutdown."
articles.content: Ukraine's nuclear energy agency says it has put the last operating reactor at Europe's largest nuclear power plant into a "cold shutdown" — a safety precaution amid catastrophic flooding from the col… [+3071 chars]
